dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Zyraethos, the Ethereal Spectral Dragon. What business do you have here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have come to challenge your presence in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a challenger? You have guts, I'll give you that. But you will regret crossing paths with me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no creature, not even a mighty dragon like yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or foolishness, only time will tell. Face the wrath of my spectral flames!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down, prepare for a fierce battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it, mortal. Your bravery ends in your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see now the error of my ways, I retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! A coward before the might of a dragon! Your fate is sealed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I didn't come here for a fight, I seek information on Vel'Zarath.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Information, you say? Interesting... What makes you think I would share such knowledge with you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not your enemy, I seek to understand the darkness that plagues this land.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity may lead to knowledge, or to doom. Choose your next words wisely.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you refuse to help, then I will find the answers on my own.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness is a trait I can appreciate, even in a mere mortal. Go, seek your answers elsewhere.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, looking to establish a truce between our kinds.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Truce? Your words are like a candle in the wind, easily extinguished. Convince me, if you can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We share a common enemy in Vel'Zarath. Together, we can bring an end to his tyranny.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interesting proposal... Perhaps there is merit in your words. But actions speak louder than words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you reject my offer, then let it be. I will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful intentions, such a rarity in this realm. Leave, before my patience wears thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking an alliance, to join forces against Vel'Zarath and his Shadow Legion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance, you say? Bold words for a mere traveler. What can you offer in return for my allegiance?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My skills as a strategist are unmatched. Together, we can outwit our enemies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strategic prowess is a valuable asset. Show me your worth in deeds, not just words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a share of the spoils from our victories. Wealth beyond imagination awaits.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wealth may tempt the greedy, but dragons desire more than material riches. Convince me further.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek a peaceful resolution, to end the conflict between our factions without bloodshed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful resolution? In this realm of darkness and death, such notions are rare. Convince me of your sincerity.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Violence only begets more violence. Let us break this cycle and strive for harmony.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harmony in the Necroshade Realm... An intriguing proposition. Your ideals are noble, but can they withstand the test of time?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If peace is not an option, then I will stand ready to defend myself if needed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defensive, yet resolute. Your stance is clear, but will it hold when darkness descends upon you?
